item.title: My First Post
item.description: Dunno. Hi? Ok. Ok ok ok. Took some googling, but I got this. Installed snapd on Fedora in order to install Hugo extended. This allowed me to use the themes that I really liked. Then I had to clean up my git modules because I kept getting an error about public being in use. After that, I edited the deploy.sh script that I got from the official documentation. It was using https, and I changed it to use ssh.
item.content:
Dunno. Hi?

Ok. Ok ok ok. Took some googling, but I got this.

Installed snapd on Fedora in order to install Hugo extended. This allowed me to use the themes that I really liked.

Then I had to clean up my git modules because I kept getting an error about public being in use.

After that, I edited the deploy.sh script that I got from the official documentation. It was using https, and I changed it to use ssh.

Now, to learn content management and markup!

Edited: Mon Jul 27 2020
